features.title: Pin Menu
features.sub_title: Arrange menu according to your need
features.description: Now you can arrange menu, pin them and sort them according to your need. This will auto sync across device.

features.title: Face Attendance
features.sub_title: Mark your attendance by just submit your selfie
features.description: Register your face, register your subordinates face attendance, take attendance and approve face registration IDs from your on login.

features.title: Digital ID
features.description: Now Digital ID have continuous scanning with 4 second timer

features.title: OKR
features.sub_title: Digital way of Goals-setting and Tracking with Outcomes
features.description: Objectives and key results is a goal-setting framework for defining and tracking objectives and their outcomes.

features.title: TPL E-PMS Evaluation PDF
features.description: Now users can download their E-PMD goals evaluation PDF
